org.pepstock.charba.client.resources

Interface Resources

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.resources.client.ClientBundle

    public interface Resources
extends com.google.gwt.resources.client.ClientBundle
    Client bundle to reference CHART.JS and other java script codes, always needed to CHARBA.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.gwt.resources.client.ClientBundle

        com.google.gwt.resources.client.ClientBundle.Source

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Resources INSTANCE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.gwt.resources.client.TextResource charbaHelper()
      This java script with a set of static methods used as utility and needed to improve JSINTEROP adoption for CHARBA, because JSINTEROP is not able to address all java script model.
      com.google.gwt.resources.client.TextResource chartJsSource()
      Contains text representation of native chart.js code

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • chartJsSource

        @ClientBundle.Source(value="js/chart.bundle.min.js")
com.google.gwt.resources.client.TextResource chartJsSource()
        Contains text representation of native chart.js code
        Returns:
        chart.js code

      • charbaHelper

        @ClientBundle.Source(value="js/charba.helper.js")
com.google.gwt.resources.client.TextResource charbaHelper()
        This java script with a set of static methods used as utility and needed to improve JSINTEROP adoption for CHARBA, because JSINTEROP is not able to address all java script model.
        Returns:
        CHARBA java script code.
